mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le imprese heroiche et morali / ritrouate da m. Gabriello Symeoni Fiorentino, al Gran Conestabile di Francia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Simeoni, Gabriele, 1509-1575 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Douglas H. Gordon Collection of French Books (University of Virginia) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: According to Brunet, the two works are ordinarily found together. [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Second title in volume with: Dialogo dell' imprese militari et amorose di Monsignor Giovio. --In Lione, 1559. Binder: Thibaron-Joly. Unidentified armorial binding, crest, with motto, Victor et fidelis. Gordon Collection. Bookplate of Douglas Gordon. Gordon list, 395. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Emblems--Italy--Early works to 1800
